titleproper.value:
Guide to the Records of the James Arthur Collection of Clocks and Watches
                    <num>RG 42.1</num>

author.value: Finding aid prepared by Joan Grant in 1985. Electronic version created by Salome Jeronimo.

creation.value:
This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit
                <date>2012-10-10T15:00-0400</date>

unittitle.value: Records of the James Arthur Collection of Clocks and Watches

p.value: There are no restrictions on the use of the collection.

Published citations should take the following form: Identification of item, date (if known); Records of the James Arthur Collection of Clocks and Watches; RG 42.1; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University Libraries.

For more detailed biographical information see 
                <emph render="italic">The National Cyclopaedia of American Biography</emph>, Volume XXXI, page 232, published by James T. White & Company, New York, 1944.

Daniel Webster Hering - first curator; served until his death on March 24, 1938 Carlos da Zafra - resigned March 1946 John M. Labberton - April 1946 - June 1950 Edward C. Smith - September 1, 1950 - ? Arthur Lionel Rawlings - September 1, 1956 - November 17, 1959 Brooks Palmer - Associate Curator - September 1, 1956 - February 1960; Curator February 1960 - ?

subject.value: Clocks and watches |v collections and collecting.
